cause.description:
i dont have much to say about animal testing but its sick and very wrong and so is fur!! animals arent supposed to be used for making us lookgood or being a tester for a lipstick or eye shawdow how sick is that and its hard to belive that such things happen, its wrong, its sick its not ok.
1. shop in places where they are against animal testing like the body shop :)
2. Dont wear fur, would u like to be worn around someones neck no u wouldnt so dont give the favour back
cause.name: against animal testing
